english.segment1: Another year has come and gone. Nothing's changed. I wasted another year. Doing the same old things. I want to break out of this. Turn my life around. I'm going to make a vow. To repent and turn to You
english.segment2: I'm crying out to You now. As I make my New Year's vow. I'll tell You I love You. And I'll honor You somehow. Hear my promise to You in this New Year's vow. I give You all of me. You'll be all of my life. And I'll never think twice. To do all that You have for me. In my New Year's vow
